title: Stormi Webster dresses as Kylie Jenner’s mini-me in Met Gala gown
text:
Kylie or Stormi? We can’t tell between them (Picture: Rex – Kylie Jenner)

It’s official, little Stormi Webster has already won Halloween as she dressed as her mum Kylie Jenner’s mini-me and frankly, it’s iconic.

The one-year-old tot took inspiration from Kylie’s lavender ostrich-feathered Versace gown which she wore to the Met Gala in May.

Making for the most adorable little costume, Stormi is seen wearing a pretty near identical dress complete with sparkling handbag and, of course, a lavender-coloured wig similar to the one Kylie rocked at the prestigious ball.

It seems Stormi really does take after her mother as the toddler stood there, pouted, posed and flashed the sweetest smile as though she were on her own red carpet.

‘My baby!!!!!!!! i cant handle this!!!! [sic],’ Kylie captioned the Instagram post with several purple heart emojis.

Stormi’s look got perhaps the most important seal of approval as her father, Travis Scott, simply left a heart emoji under the pictures.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Model Chanel Iman had all the feels too and commented: ‘Ohhh I love it She’s adorable,’ while Cassie Ventura shared a similar response: ‘OMG I can’t.’

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Kris Jenner’s boyfriend Corey Gamble basically hailed little Stormi a queen and said: ‘She The real Boss!’ while Sofia Richie exclaimed: ‘Omg I can’t deal.’

Stormi’s epic Halloween costume also got the thumbs up from the likes of Paris Hilton and Vanessa Hudgens.

Well done Stormi, you’re the MVP of Halloween 2019.

Iconic (Picture: Rex Features)

Kylie and Stassi recreating that famous moment (Picture: Kylie Jenner, Instagram)

Kylie, 22, has been killing it this spooky season after revealing her first costume over the weekend.

Following a wild night out with Scott Disick’s girlfriend Sofia, which included downing tequila from the bottle, the cosmetics mogul transformed herself into Madonna while her bestie Anastasia ‘Stassi’ Karanikolaou became Britney Spears.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The pair then recreated the iconic moment the popstars kissed on-stage at the MTV Video Music Awards in 2003.

And Kylie teased that was only her first outfit so the best is probably yet to come once 31 October rears its creepy head.

description: Kylie Jenner dressed her daughter Stormi Webster in the same gown she wore to the Met Gala 2019 for Halloween.
